description.narrative: DPC - Stand Alone project to support the 2021-2025 management costs for the country office in Uganda

participating-org.narrative: UGA Office of the Prime Mster

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative:
Output1: Enhanced programme cost recovery and/or direct project costing to the implementation of the UNDP Country Programme. (a) 64398 – Direct Project Costs in USD– Staffing =$1,349,000 (2016) ,Project/Programme Documents/Project reports/AWPs (b) 74598 – Direct Project Costs in USD – General Operating Expenses (GOE)=$0 (2016), Project/ Programme Documents/Project reports/AWPs Number of staff benefiting from DPC=45 (2016), Project/ Programme Documents/Project reports/AWPs
Output2:Improved Effectiveness of development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation 1) A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place=A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place.(2014), 2) Number of staff with skills and knowledge in target areas=106 (2016), training report. 3) Annual NIM audit report in place=Annual NIM audit report (2015), Annual NIM audit report. 4) Number of HACT micro-assessment reports=26 (2016), HACT website. 5) A functional aid management platform=partial (2016), Sector reports. 6) UNDP Annual Report in place=UNDP annual report (2016), UNDP website. 7) Up-to-date website in place=UNDP website (2016), UNDP website. 8) Updated corporate brochure in place=Updated corporate brochure (2016), UNDP website. 9) Op-eds in place=Op-eds in place (2016), UNDP website. 10) Video blogs in place=video blogs(2016), UNDP website. 11) 5 of planned evaluations conducted = 3 evaluations
Output 3: Enhanced SDG Implementation through Policy Innovation and effective Planning 3.1: No. of MDAs and LGs developing and implementing strategic development plans and frameworks and complying with NDPII Priorities = 1 (2016),
3.2). 2 diagnostic studies published and disseminated

Output1: Enhanced programme cost recovery and/or direct project costing to the implementation of the UNDP Country Programme. (a) 64398 – Direct Project Costs in USD– Staffing. (b) 74598 – Direct Project Costs in USD – General Operating Expenses (GOE). Number of staff benefiting from DPC.

3.2. Number of diagnostic studies published and disseminated

Output1: Enhanced programme cost recovery and/or direct project costing to the implementation of the UNDP Country Programme (a) 64398 – Direct Project Costs in USD– Staffing = $1,100,900 (b) 74598 – Direct Project Costs in USD – General Operating Expenses (GOE) = $555,382 Number of staff benefiting from DPC.=50
Output2: Improved Effectiveness of development Cooperation, & CPD Implementation 1) A CPD annual portfolio review report/minutes in place = 2 Reports on CPD portfolio performance for 2019 and that of 2020 2) 60 staff with skills and knowledge in target areas, UNDP staff and partner capacities enhanced 3) Annual NIM audit report in place = 1 annual NIM audit completed 4) 6 HACT micro-assessment reports completed= 6 HACT micro-assessment reports 5) A functional aid management platform in place = Fully 6) UNDP Annual Report in place = 1 UNDP Annual Report 7) Up-to-date website in place = Annual up-to-date website 8) Updated corporate brochure in place = 1 corporate brochure updated 9) Op-eds in place = 2 Op-eds published 10) Video blogs in place = 2 video blogs 11. 3 planned evaluations completed
Output 3: Enhanced SDG Implementation through Policy Innovation and effective Planning 3.1: 8 MDAs and 70 LGs developing and implementing strategic development plans and frameworks and complying with NDPII Priorities 3.2 Three diagnostic studies published and disseminated
